description: A customizable chip component used to display information in a compact area

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the inner div.

properties.name: hasError
properties.description: Whether the chip has an error.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label to display in the chip.

properties.name: showRemove
properties.description: Whether to show the close icon on right side of the chip.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: The shape of the chip: 'rectangle' (default) or 'circle'.

events.name: chipClick
events.description: Event emitted when the chip is clicked or activated via keyboard.

events.name: chipRemove
events.description: Event emitted when the close chip icon button is clicked.

examples.basic:
<modus-wc-chip
      aria-label="Chip example"
      active=${ifDefined(args.active)}
      disabled=${ifDefined(args.disabled)}
      has-error=${ifDefined(args['has-error'])}
      label=${args.label}
      shape=${args.shape}
      show-remove=${ifDefined(args['show-remove'])}
      size=${args.size}
      variant=${args.variant}
    />
